snippet: Bill Powers, the president of the University of Texas at Austin, retained his position on Thursday after getting a cautious endorsement from his frustrated chancellor.
abstract: Bill Powers, president of the University of Texas at Austin, retains his position after receiving a cautious endorsement from his frustrated chancellor Francisco G Cigarroa.
lead_paragraph: Bill Powers, the president of the University of Texas at Austin, retained his position on Thursday after getting a cautious endorsement from his frustrated chancellor.

headline.main: Texas: Regents Keep Chief of Austin Campus
headline.print_headline: Texas: Regents Keep Chief of Austin Campus
